ibVerifyCollection.pl -- Perl Script for Verifying Distribution Package Collection

Author: Mark S. Millard
Last Modified: April 17, 2000

NAME

ibVerifyCollection.pl -- compare a candidate collection file against a master

SYNOPSIS

perl ibVerifyCollection.pl master candidate

DESCRIPTION

ibVerifyCollection.pl compares a candidate collection file against a master, reporting what entries missing from the candidate or extra in the candidate. Any entries in the master which are not in the candidate are written to a file named "missing". Any entries which are in the candidate and not in the master are written to a file named "extra".

DIAGNOSTICS
ibVerifyCollection.pl returns non-zero if there are any problems with the files or any missing or extra entries in candidate.

SEE ALSO

InstallBuilder, ibBuild.pl, ibCollect.pl
Last Published: May 18, 2000
